body.name: SYLVOX 15.6" Flip Down Smart TV Under Cabinet TV Supports 360 Degree Rotation WiFi & Wireless Connection, Storage Design for Kitchen Bedroom RV Yacht (Wood Grain Color)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 36 mins
features: Flap-Down kitchen TV: Designed for the kitchen, the screen can be rotated from many angles. Storage design, beautiful, and save space in the kitchen.
Smart TV: Adopt the Google system. You can download your favorite food app to improve your cooking skills and make cooking very interesting.
Under Cabinet TV: Flat screen TV supports ARC &CEC, WiFi, and Wireless Connection, with LED clock display, and can set the cooking timer alarm clock to make your delicious dishes appear on time.
Superior Experience: 1080P FHD TV with 178°H/178°V ultra-wide viewing angle, 8-bit color panel with 16.7 million colors, bringing amazing picture experience.

Multi-Function: Kitchen TV front dual audio, support DC12v power input and 360-degree rotation TV, supports HBBTV, and rear port for easy access to the TV antenna, you can watch news programs anytime.
body.description: SYLVOX Kitchen TV can make your kitchen full of fun. 1. Whether at breakfast or dinner, you can watch your favorite programs such as TV news and live games on the Kitchen TV. You also learn new cooking techniques and try different dishes on the small TV, making the cooking process very interesting. 2. Flap down Smart TV is equipped with Google 11.0 system with 1.5G+8G memory, you can download the apps you want anytime. 3. Humanized design with touch buttons, with remote control storage bracket, with LED clock display, and you can set a timer alarm clock. 4. When the TV is not in use, it can be folded upward for storage, not taking up kitchen space. 5. Top storage and installation method, easy to install. 6. TV screen can be flipped back and forth, and also can be rotated left and right, very flexible and convenient to use. Specifications. Viewing Angle Degree(H/V) H:178°, V:178° Aspect Ratio 16:9 VIDEO INPUT ATV/DTV NETWORK INPUT RJ45 Wireless Connection: 5.0 WiFi ：Support 5G Certificated Apps: Netflix,Youtube,Twitter,Facebook,AccuWeather,Mirracast,Vudu,Pandora HTML5 mini AV, CEC&ARC*2, Line (L/R) out, RF, Earphone, USB*2 AC 100-240V, DC12V , 9-32V wide voltage protection Stand 404.35*268*36.5mm Product Dimension without stand 373.35*226.85*9.5mm Operating temp -4℉ to 113℉ (-20℃ to 45℃) Support phones screencasting Touch keys Timing function (15-60 minutes optional)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Decorate your kitchen with a smart TV and turn it into a living room that carries endless joy. Elevate your dining experience by catching your favorite TV shows during breakfast or dinner. Stay updated with the latest news, watch live sports, and discover new cooking techniques—all on SYLVOX under cabinet TV. Cooking is no longer a chore, but a delightful experience! Under cabinet TV has a built-in Google Play Store, so you can download your favorite food app, browse your favorite bloggers, watch your favorite sports events, and collect your favorite content. Make your kitchen full of fun too! The new flip-down smart TV comes in a Wood Grain Color design with a color that more closely matches the color of your house, which will blend in well with the environment and bring you more surprises visually.

Under cabinet tv for kitchen smart tv Smart TV can be stored upward, and the environment into one, does not take up kitchen space, hidden design, simple and beautiful. If you want to add a smart TV to your tiny house, believe this 12 volt small TV is a good choice for you. Kitchen TV with LED clock display Flip down kitchen TV has a separate clock display and you can set a timed alarm for your cooking, so you can't miss the taste! Even if you don't use the TV, the Sylvox Smart TV will show you the time for your convenience. Enjoy family fun time You can spend time with your family, watch food shows, grow your cooking skills and make cooking so relaxing. You can use the SMART TV in your kitchen, bedroom, RV, etc. The Sylvox TV makes displays everywhere.

12Volt mini TV, suitable for most scenarios. Whether it's a kitchen, bedroom, RV, or yacht, the 12v TV can be well combined with the environment and give you a more beautiful home environment. 1. 12 Volt TV: As a small TV, supports DC wide voltage (9-32v) input, with AC 110V power adapter, Suitable for vehicle and indoor use. (Set does not include 12v car power cable) 2. Google TV supports WiFi, Wireless Connection and ARC &CEC functions, so you can conveniently connect different devices and experience Internet functions. 3. You can cast your phone's content on the under counter TV and share it with your family to enjoy endless fun.

Flip down kitchen TV Flat screen tv can rotate 360 degrees and flip 90 degrees. 178°/178° wide view, no matter where you install it, you will be able to see the TV content clearly. 1080P FHD TV High-definition LCD TV: Resolution 1920 x 1080 picture quality, full high definition LCD TV, ELED backlight, slim and lightweight body. High-performance 16: 9 aspect ratio LCD panel, 8-bit color panel with 16.7 million colors. Smart TV SYLVOX fold down TV built-in APP Store, Android 11.0. You can download your favorite apps. Collect your favorite content.

You can install it where you want, either for home use or commercial use. Specifications. Aspect Ratio 16:9 VIDEO INPUT ATV/DTV NETWORK INPUT RJ45 & WIFI Wireless Connection: 5.0 WiFi ：Support 5G Certificated Apps: Netflix,Youtube,Twitter,Facebook,AccuWeather,Mirracast,Vudu,Pandora HTML5 mini AV, CEC&ARC, Line (L/R) out, RF, Earphone, USB*2 AC 100-240V, DC12V , 9-32V wide voltage protection Operating temp -4℉ to 113℉ (-20℃ to 45℃) Support screencasting Touch keys Timing function (15-60 minutes optional)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally.... One of these TV's that works!
reviews.reviewText: This was for my wife for the kitchen. She loves to cook and this thing is perfecto. I have been looking for a positive review for one of these TV's for years going back 10 _ 15yrs and gave up.This Xmas it hit me and I went looking and this thing it's perfect... SO FAR. It's been about a month and been using it regularly and it works great with the wifi and streaming services and the rest.If this thing goes south, I'll be on here to let you know.. But so far so great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars great picture but some difficulties getting it set up
reviews.reviewText: This smart TV was replacing our old second TV. Installation was pretty straight forward, but one should beaware that it is the TV that swivels not the screen. Putting it under 12" deep cabinet meant we had to have it stick out. The max you can do is 21/2 " This means that when you swivel the back of the TV hits the walland limits the swivel.We also have had to use our old remote to change channels and the new one for one/off and volume

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome for Van/Car life
reviews.reviewText: I do the “van life” but I live in my 2016 rav 4. As you might imagine I dont all the room a van does. but after custom fitting a full twin bed in the back I dont have much options for a tv. Well this one IS PERFECT! I was able to mount it on the inside roof of my car, and it has been a game changer. how it mounts keeps it nice and tucked in, and having the screen fold down and up is so clutch. Also it swivels! so you can point it in any direction, and the screen when it folds down stays in place so you can fold it to a 90 degree angle or anything in between and it will stay. So with the swivel and the fold down screen you can set it up for perfect viewing no matter what position you are watching. And it is a $400 tv so you will be happy to know the picture quality is fantastic. you get what you pay for. I am beyond greatful this product exists!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it, but note that the whole thing swivels, not just the screen.
reviews.reviewText: Still really love it. Added a pic of the back as best I can to show the ports and hookups. Really like this. It’s so new that I haven’t taken the film off the screen. I’ll do that when it’s dirty as I have this in the kitchen near to the stove. Haven’t yet mounted the FIOS box, but will now that we’re sure we like the location. I had a cabinet mounted drop TV that I liked a lot for about 10 years. I replaced it with a piece of garbage…failed to read the reviews thoroughly so I can only blame myself. I have had sound but no picture for maybe 2 years. I got tired of it and found this Sylvox. So new that Verizon hasn’t yet listed it as a brand to select for the remote. LOVE it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't Waste Your Money!
reviews.reviewText: We just completed remodeling our kitchen and my wife saw this product and had to have it. I surprised her with an installation.We've had it installed for the good part of a month and it has performed like CRAP.It has had problems with the audio cutting in and out. I've replaced all of the cabling, reprogrammed it without any improvement.To compensate for the intermittent audio, we turn on the audio system in the home theater and watch the video when working in the kitchen.Too late to return for a refund. Walk away from this LOUSY product! Just Walk Away!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was concerned when I installed the TV under a kitchen cabinet and the mounting plate connector broke due to too much force on my part, but Aimee made sure a replacement plate was mailed out immediately. The new plate worked and I'm watching TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It would be nice if the TV worked with a Comcast/Xfinity remote! Need 2 remotes to work this TV!
reviews.reviewText: Picture and sound very good, but a Comcast/Xfinity remote does not work with this model.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sylvia flip down smart TV is a solution for the kitchen
reviews.reviewText: The product is easy to install and program and can connect wirelessly like a smart device or to cable, DISH or DirecTV with a cable. The selection of media is done simply with a screen option selection. When not in use this smart TV folds up and away and you have regained countertop access. The design is compact, low weight, easy to install and provides flexibility to the media viewer.
